name: Horde of Methuselah
description:
Ready to play this real time strategy game that will place your resource management skills to the limit? Be prepared to expand your small group of survivors to a well oiled zombie slaying machine empire! This simple game will have you glued to the screen watching literal pixels, as you expand your territory and fight off the ever growing zombie threat! How long can you survive? And can you rid the island of the zombie infestation?

Witness the never ending death and rebirth of the Methulselian Horde as you struggle to claim territory and resources in this hostile world. Build up your base, manage resources, and expand your territory as you struggle to gain a foothold in a procedurally generated hell-scape. Keep a close eye on resources and population, as famine can set in unexpectedly, wiping out your units and leading to the downfall of the last remnants of humanity.

The shelters will light a safe zone for you to build in.

New buildings can be purchased for 200 wood and 200 stone.

Buildings will spawn gatherers to collect resources for you.

Gathers can only collect resources if they are on the right pixel.

Green for wood, brown for food, gray for stone.

Barracks will spawn soldiers, units that will fight and kill incoming zombies. 

Soldiers are the only friendly units that can leave the safe zone.

Your settlement requires food to survive, when your food reaches 0 units will begin to die.

If your population reaches 0, you lose.

PS: Leaderboard is currently broken working on a fix.
